name: Drone Racer (itch)
description:
This was built as a playable example of the my Unity package

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/templates/packs/drone-explorer-pack-216095

It makes use of the Synty Store Asset pack Simple Apocalypse:

https://syntystore.com/products/simple-apocalypse-cartoon-assets

If you are an aspiring level designer,  feel free use my code.
